title: Interviewed and quoted as an expert in free-space optics
description: Interviewed and quoted as an expert in free-space optics for IEEE Spectrum magazine article Moonbeams by the Megabyte on the NASA Lunar Laser Communication Demonstration (LLCD).

title: Positive book review for first edition of my book
description: Positive book review for first edition of my book in IEEE Wireless Communications.

title: NSERC research funding approved
description: Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada research funding approved for project on Visible Light Communications with principle investigator Dr. Steve Hranilovic and co-investigator Dr. Lutz Lampe (U British Columbia). This $450,000 fund will be used over the next three years to develop novel communication algorithms and experiments, localization techniques as well as vehicle-to-vehicle optical experiments.

title: Dr. Steve Hranilovic named Editor
description: October 2011 - Dr. Steve Hranilovic named Editor of the IEEE Transactions on Communications in the area of Optical Wireless Communications.

title: 1st IEEE Workshop on Optical Wireless Communications
description: Drs. Kavehrad, Xu and Hranilovic - Organizers and co-Chairs for the 1st IEEE Workshop on Optical Wireless Communications in conjunction with IEEE Globecom 2010, Miami FL USA, Dec. 10, 2010.

title: Canadian Foundation for Innovation funding
description: Canadian Foundation for Innovation funding for Free-Space Optical Communication Algorithms Laboratory (FOCAL). This $260,000 investment will be used to establish a world-leading FSO testbed at McMaster University.

title: Ministry of Research and Innovation funding
description: Announcement of Ministry of Research and Innovation, Ontario Research Fund (ORF) funding for the Free-Space Optical Communication Algorithms Laboratory (FOCAL).

title: Invited lecture to the Nortel Networks Institute
description: Dr. Hranilovic gives an invited lecture to the Nortel Networks Institute, University of Waterloo.

title: Canada Foundation for Innovation (CFI) funding
description: Announcement of Canada Foundation for Innovation (CFI) funding for the Free-Space Optical Communication Algorithms Laboratory (FOCAL).

title: Government of Ontario Early Researcher Award
description: Announcement of Government of Ontario Early Researcher Award.

title: McMaster University Daily News article
description: McMaster University Daily News article on my research program.

title: New Feature Added: Create Custom Web Pages with Unique URL
description: Our platform now allows you to create and customize web pages with unique URLs. You can insert these unique URLs into the News & Resources page or share them directly with others, ensuring secure and easy access to your content.
